title: 5 most affordable schools in Dubai

organizations.name: salman farsi iranian boys school curriculum

text: 5 most affordable schools in Dubai Web Team /Dubai Filed on February 26, 2017 Share Vote Take a look at some of the private schools that offer cheapest fees in Dubai. Dubai has some very expensive schools that are affordable only for a few section of the society. But the city also has a list of schools that offer affordable fees for a large section of people. As of 2016, there are 173 private schools in Dubai with a total of 265,299 students, according to the Knowledge and Human Development Authority (KHDA). Dubai private school at a glance: (Click to enlarge the image) Khaleej Times takes a look at some of the private schools that offer cheapest fees in Dubai. 1 Salman Farsi Iranian Boys School Curriculum : Iranian
